thread.title: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone and More Star In Oscars-Edition of “Mean Tweets”
thread.title_full: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone and More Star In Oscars-Edition of “Mean Tweets”

author: Chris Danforth
title: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone and More Star In Oscars-Edition of “Mean Tweets”
text:
Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman, Samuel L. Jackson and more address their biggest Twitter critics in this latest episode of “Mean Tweets” courtesy of Jimmy Kimmel Live! 
Following up on past episodes with NFL players and even Barack Obama , this time around it’s Hollywood A-listers in the hot seat, as they read aloud some of of their wildest mentions. Highlights include Samuel L. Jackson admitting to his “resting fart face,” and Jeff Bridges coming clean about wearing pants less than people think.
In other Oscar news, read about the awkward Best Picture mixup between La La Land and Moonlight .
